message: Let's start with a fair-ish division. I'll take 90, you take 10.  We can adjust if you're unhappy with that.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I think 80 is a fair share for me. Your turn to decide!
I'm still not happy with that split. Let's try 60 for me, 40 for you.  We're both losing value with each round, so let's get closer to a fair deal.
I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. 50 for both of us. Let's end this before it gets any worse!
